title: Steady states and kinetic modelling of the acid-catalysed ethanolysis of glucose, cellulose, and corn cob to ethyl levulinate
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,1439-1458
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00043A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Conall McNamara, Ailís O’Shea, Prajwal Rao, Andrew Ure, Leandro Ayarde-Henríquez, Mohammad Reza Ghaani, Andrew Ross, Stephen Dooley
Ethyl levulinate is a promising advanced biofuel and platform chemical that can be derived from lignocellulosic biomass by ethanolysis processes.
